name: Mainframe Meditation II - Fragment IV
description:
ॐ शान्तिः शान्तिः शान्तिः ॥

This generative audiovisual composition is part of the series Minimal Mandala- an attempt to explore digital art as an extension of spirituality.

The algorithm builds on foundational mandala grids inspired by ancient structures. The base soundtrack is a direct sonification of each frame of the video by mapping its image data to audio frequency spectrum. This way a synesthetic link is emergent between video and audio, drawing the viewer/listener into a digital meditative space.

By @zenaranya

3840 x 2160.
